text.script:
from hint import evaluate from hint.get_hint import get_hint_w_variables
# grader of the problem def check(expect, ans): return evaluate.evaluate_w_variables(expect, ans, variable_values)
# hint function def hint_fn(answer_ids, student_answers, new_cmap, old_cmap): aid = answer_ids[0] ans = str(student_answers[aid]) i = int(aid[-3])-2
if ans == "": return key = new_cmap.keys()[0] if new_cmap[key]['correctness'] == "correct": return
hint = get_hint_w_variables(solutions[i], ans, hint_text_id, i, variable_values) new_cmap.set_hint_and_mode(aid,hint,'always')
